name: global capital
overview:
Global Capital Ltd is a private equity management firm, and a leader in identifying and growing start-up and pre-IPO companies involved in IT, oil palm plantation, commodities trading, property development industries and sectors. It has a very broad base of local partners in their respective countries of operations and for that reason, it is one of the best regionally connected private equity firms in the Asia Pacific region, who can provide comprehensive insight, deal flow and networks.

Global Capital Partners A (GCPA) is a private equity fund with approximately US$3 billion portfolio under management. GCPA which set up in 2008 is the leader in the middle market targeted to ICT start up and pre-IPO companies in Emerging Markets, especially in Asia Pacific.

Global Capital portfolio operates in various fields such as telecommunication infrastructure, mobile Internet, B2B e-commerce, social network, mobile phone and web business, agriculture, natural resources such as coal, oil & gas, green energy, financial services and many more.

Global Capitalâ€™s most significant operations are located in South East Asia such as Thailand, Indonesia, Vietnam and Philippines, where it generates approximately 42% of its revenues, with other operations located elsewhere in India, China, Middle East, Europe and the United States.
